price: Kemudian, Tuhan-nya memilihnya951, maka Dia menerima tobatnya dan memberinya petunjuk.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ
footnotes: 951.  Maksudnya, Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā  memilih Nabi Adam ‘Alaihissalām untuk menjadi orang yang dekat kepada-Nya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
